[](https://www.dearbrightly.com/<https:/www.dearbrightly.com/nxt/cart>)
# Ready. Set. Retinoid.
Your skin's favorite fitness routine
[START YOUR JOURNEY NOW](https://www.dearbrightly.com/<https:/www.dearbrightly.com/night-shift/>)
## Ready. Set. Retinoid.
Your skin's favorite fitness routine
[START YOUR JOURNEY NOW](https://www.dearbrightly.com/<https:/www.dearbrightly.com/night-shift/>)
## Tailored, prescription-strength retinoids for your healthiest skin.
We offer a tailored solution from doctors online as easy as 1-2-3.
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Mask-group-5.jpg)
### STEP 1
Share your skin goals
No need for an in-person visit to thedermatologist. In just a few minutes, share details about your skin and upload photos on our secure telehealth portal.
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Mask-group-1-2.jpg)
### STEP 2
Our doctors tailor your formula
You are unique and your skin is too. A doctor will review your profile and tailor your derm-strength Night Shift serum to create a formula just for you.
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Mask-group-2-2.png)
### STEP 3
Check in with your skin coach
Like any fitness routine, retinoids work best by starting out slowly. Your provider is available at any time to check in and assess your progress.
[START YOUR JOURNEY NOW](https://www.dearbrightly.com/<https:/www.dearbrightly.com/night-shift/>)
## AS SEEN IN
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![Black square with no visible content.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![A stylized silhouette of a cat in a playful, stretching pose. The design features delicate curves and simple lines against a plain background.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![A black and white image of a violin lying on a table near an open book. The instrument casts a shadow, and light falls from the right.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
## "An absolute game changer in skincare."
No appointments, no waiting rooms. Just your best skin yet.
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
### Save Your Day
Get your tailored prescription straight from your phone or computer.
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
### Save Your Time
Create your skin profile and upload your photos in minutes.
![](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
### Save Your Money
An in-person visit could cost up to $400 including product. 
## Start seeing results as early as 2 weeks.*
Practice makes progress! Start slowly, be patient, and watch your skin transform. Collagen isn’t built in a day, so we’ve made sure you’ve got the right routine for the journey. And we’re here to be your coach, teammate, and biggest fan – every step of the way. *Individual results may vary
![Close-up of a woman's face with blue eyes and freckles, showing a streak of sunscreen on her cheek, and her lips slightly closed in a neutral expression.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
1-2 weeks
Brightens and reduces uneven skin tone.
![Close-up of a person touching their cheek, showing smooth skin and a neutral expression.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
2-4 weeks
Discoloration is improved.
![A person with freckles gazes upward with a thoughtful expression, resting one hand on their face.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
4-6 weeks
Brown spots diminish.
![A person applies a skincare product to their cheek with a finger.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
3-6 months
Reduced fine lines and wrinkles.
![Person gently applying skincare product to their cheek with eyes closed.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
6 months - 1 year
Clear, radiant skin
## Why prescription strength retinoid?
![Two people with close-up faces are side by side, showing different skin tones and features in a neutral expression.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
Prescription Strength Retinoid
Over The Counter Retinol
20x more potent than retinol
![A white checkmark is centered on a black background.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![A solid black square with no visible features or details.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
The only FDA approved retinoid for photoaging (sun damage and early aging)
![A white checkmark is centered on a black background.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![A solid black square with no visible features or details.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
50 years of research proves its long-term safety and efficacy
![A white checkmark is centered on a black background.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![A solid black square with no visible features or details.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
Stronger than over-the-counter Differin, which is not FDA approved for photoaging
![A white checkmark is centered on a black background.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
![A solid black square with no visible features or details.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
## Before & After
*Individual results may vary
### Night Shift
Rx Face Serum
$66 Trial Offer
First-time trial 2-month supply
![A blue car is parked in a modern driveway surrounded by trees and plants.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
Night Shift, our tailored retinoid serum, is the backbone of a great skincare routine. Proven to prevent and treat wrinkles, uneven skin tone, enlarged pores, and acne, it’s no wonder this dermatologist-tested super serum is making gains. Get your tailored prescription without leaving your house.
[Learn More](https://www.dearbrightly.com/<https:/www.dearbrightly.com/night-shift/>)
## Community Reviews
![Five grey stars aligned horizontally.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
The order process for this product was so easy. The dermatologist was very easy to work with and I was 100% satisfied. Enjoy using this product and its ingredients leave my skin looking so healthy and not irritated or peeling like other retinoids I have used. It also allows you with ease to delay an order shipment if you do not need more product at the moment. Thank you guys!!
Janet F.
![Five grey stars aligned horizontally.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
I have been using Night Shift for 3 months now. I can really tell a difference in my skin. It looks healthier and I have gotten lots of comments about how good my skin looks. I am not experiencing any peeling or redness from using it and I am able to use it every night. I would highly recommend giving Night Shift a try if you are looking to amp up your skincare routine.
Andrea W.
![Five grey stars aligned horizontally.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
I have been using the product for about three weeks now. The Night Shift did not cause any drying at all. I’m up to every other night already. I can tell my pores are smaller and the surface of my skin feels smoother. The wrinkles haven’t changed yet. I’m sure with continued use I will see more of a difference.
Laura K.
![Five grey stars aligned horizontally.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)
Nightshift is great. I had to use it every third night for quite a while because my skin is so sensitive, but now I can use it every other day with no problem. I'm noticing a visible difference in the appearance of my skin. I think that the formulation helps with redness more than other products I've tried. I've used it for a couple years now and plan to continue!
Whitney S.
## We don't gatekeep good skin care.
Prescription strength retinoids (a.k.a Retina-A, Tretinoin) don’t need to be the best kept secret anymore.
[START NOW](https://www.dearbrightly.com/<https:/www.dearbrightly.com/night-shift/>)
![The image shows the text "DEAR BRIGHTLY" in bold, capital letters with a small star shape next to it.](https://www.dearbrightly.com)

generated_description:
**Dear Brightly: Your Online Prescription Skincare Solution**

Founded in 2018 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W18, Dear Brightly is tackling a common problem in skincare: access to effective, dermatologist-vetted prescription products. Located in the heart of San Francisco, with a compact team of three, this startup is making waves in the telehealth space by offering personalized skincare solutions with a tech twist.

The mission is simple yet impactful: to provide people with tailored, prescription-strength skincare that fosters healthy skin. This is done entirely online, eliminating the need for in-person dermatologist visits. The process is straightforward and user-friendly; customers share their skin goals via a secure telehealth portal, and then licensed doctors create a personalized serum, like their flagship product, the **Night Shift** retinoid serum. 

### Why Retinoids?

Prescription-strength retinoids, such as those offered by Dear Brightly, are significantly more potent than over-the-counter alternatives—around 20 times stronger, in fact. They’re the only FDA-approved treatment for photoaging, backed by over 50 years of research underscoring their efficacy and safety. For those seeking real results, this could make all the difference.

### The Experience

Starting your skincare journey is as easy as 1-2-3:
1. **Share Your Goals**: No need to visit a clinic; just upload some pictures and answer questions about your skin.
2. **Tailored Formulation**: A qualified dermatologist reviews your information and customizes a serum specifically for you.
3. **Ongoing Support**: Regular follow-ups with your skin coach ensure that you’re on the right track—just like a fitness routine, gradual progress is the key.

### Community Feedback

Clients rave about the ease of ordering, the quality of the product, and the responsiveness of dermatologists. Users have reported visible improvements in their skin within just a few weeks, highlighting the difference that a tailored regimen can make without unnecessary irritation.

### Start Your Journey

Dear Brightly isn't just about selling products; it's about demystifying skincare and making effective, prescription treatments accessible to everyone. Forget waiting rooms and hefty fees—your best skin is just a few clicks away.

For more information, check out their website at [dearbrightly.com](https://www.dearbrightly.com).
